org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class DataNode.DataTransfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DataNode.DataTransfer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    DataNode

    private class DataNode.DataTransfer
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Used for transferring a block of data. This class sends a piece of data to another DataNode.
